title: Archer Defense
description: Archer Defense is an action game where you play as an archer defending your position against waves of enemies. You start with a basic bow, but you can upgrade it over time and use different power-ups like bomb, multi-shot, and freeze arrows. You can also set up defenses like sentries and barbed wires to help you fend off the enemy waves. The game features daily rewards, loot boxes to obtain new and powerful bows, and multiple levels of increasing difficulty. Can you defend your position against the enemy onslaught and emerge victorious?
